thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Truly wonderful hotel and staff
thread.title_full: Truly wonderful hotel and staff - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Graham G
title: Truly wonderful hotel and staff
text: Wow! What a wonderful hotel with fantastic staff! The room upgrade was beautiful, and though initially worried about potential street noise... we could hear a pin drop the room was so quiet. The AC as with some other comments was too hot (despite tinkering) and it caused us both sleep issues, however that can't detract from what a lovely hotel this is. What more Will and Raj made our stay even more special! thank you very much!
